p: Strong significant ( P < 0.01) correlation was recorded among invaded and non-invaded quadrats found in Huailai comparable to other locations showed nonsignificant ( P > 0.05) investigations. Species richness recorded highly significant ( P < 0.001) results in all locations. Native plant species are more diversified found significant ( P < 0.05) individuals per quadrat in its non-invaded compared to invaded by X. strumarium ( Table 1 and Fig 2).
